verses.text: \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he hath \w torn|strong="H2963"\w*, and he will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* us; he hath \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*, and he will bind us \w up|strong="H2280"\w*.

After two \w days|strong="H3117"\w* will he \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* us: in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he will raise us \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and we shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

Then shall we \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \add if\add* we \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* on to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: his going \w forth|strong="H4161"\w* is \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* as the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*; and he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto us as the \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, as the \w latter|strong="H4456"\w* \add and\add* former \w rain|strong="H3384"\w* unto the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ O \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, what shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee? O \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, what shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee? for your \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* as a \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and as the \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* it goeth \w away|strong="H1980"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft goodness: or, mercy, or, kindness\f*

Therefore have I \w hewed|strong="H2672"\w* \add them\add* by the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*; I have \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* them by the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: and thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are as\add* the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \add that\add* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft and…: or, that thy judgments might be, etc\f*

For I \w desired|strong="H2654"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, and not \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*; and the \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* more than burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*.

But they like \w men|strong="H0120"\w* have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: there have they dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* against me.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft men: or, Adam\f*

\w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \add is\add* a \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of them that \w work|strong="H6466"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, \add and is\add* \w polluted|strong="H6121"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft polluted: or, cunning for\f*

And as \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* of robbers \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* for a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \add so\add* the \w company|strong="H2267"\w* of \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w murder|strong="H7523"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by \w consent|strong="H7926"\w*: for they \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w*.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft by…: Heb. with one shoulder, or, to Shechem\f*\f + \fr 6.9 \ft lewdness: or, enormity\f*

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* an horrible \w thing|strong="H8186"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: there \add is\add* the \w whoredom|strong="H2184"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*.

Also, O \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, he hath \w set|strong="H7896"\w* an \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* for thee, when I \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
